title: Kate Hudson goes cowgirl chic in white with daughter Rani after celebrating her first birthday
text:
With three adorable children, Kate Hudson is the very definition of motherhood goals.

The Almost Famous actress recently celebrated her beautiful baby girl Rani's first birthday.

Kate cut a cowgirl chic look in white Sunday as she stepped out with her family and friends.

Cowgirl chic: Kate Hudson cut a cowgirl chic look in white Sunday as she stepped out with her family and friends

She was spotted donning a white-on-white polka-dotted blouse as she and partner Danny Fujikawa went for a family outing in Los Angeles.

The 40-year-old wore the shirt tucked into a matching pair of high-waisted short shorts, also featuring the polka dots.

She accessorized with a white stetson wrapped in a black leather band, a pair of black Ray-Ban wayfarers and some gold chain necklaces.

Kate completed the western chic look with a cute pair of white leather cowgirl boots, featuring brown soles and heels.

Polka dots: She was spotted donning a white-on-white polka-dotted blouse as she and partner Danny Fujikawa went for a family outing in Los Angeles

Yee-haw: She accessorized with a white stetson wrapped in a black leather band, a pair of black Ray-Ban wayfarers and some gold chain necklaces

Boot scootin: The 40-year-old wore the shirt tucked into a matching pair of high-waisted short shorts, also featuring the polka dots. Kate completed the western chic look with a cute pair of white leather cowgirl boots, featuring brown soles and heels

Team work: The How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days star handed Rani off to Danny as she set up the baby's stroller

Family outing: She wore her hair back in a ponytail under the stetson, which she removed as they started walking

The How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days star handed Rani off to Danny as she set up the baby's stroller.

She wore her hair back in a ponytail under the stetson, which she removed as they started walking.

The actress recently posted an adorable video of Rani in celebration of her first birthday.

Happy birthday! The actress recently posted an adorable video of Rani in celebration of her first birthday

Mama's girl: Cut together by daddy Danny, it featured some sweet footage of Rani and Kate set to a soft guitar and vocal melody

Cut together by daddy Danny, it featured some sweet footage of Rani and Kate set to a soft guitar and vocal melody.

The video was captioned: 'And what a year it’s a been. A big Happy 1st Birthday to Rani Rose.'

Grandma Goldie Hawn also posted an adorable snap of Rani clapping her hands for the big day, captioned: 'Happy 1st birthday to my granddaughter Rani Rose Fujikawa. Our new little princess flower who makes us jump for joy.'
description: The actress recently posted an adorable video of Rani in celebration of her first birthday, which was captioned: 'And what a year it's a been. A big Happy 1st Birthday to Rani Rose.'
